data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 2, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 4, Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cincinnati's half?
Robert Sibiga signals a New York throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of New York.
Free kick Cincinnati.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of New York.
Aaron Long is booked for the home team.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
In the minute 9, Cincinnati's Frankie Amaya breaks free at Red Bull Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for New York at Red Bull Arena.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
New York have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Harrison.
In the minute 15, Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
New York to take a throw-in in Cincinnati territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 17, Cristian Casseres Jr gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York.
Robert Sibiga signals a New York throw-in in Cincinnati's half.
Cincinnati needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jurgen Locadia for Cincinnati drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 22, Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
In the minute 24, In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Cincinnati in Harrison.
In the minute 25, Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
Can New York capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
New York have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sean Nealis (New York) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 31, New York's Cristian Casseres Jr gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Robert Sibiga awards Cincinnati a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Harrison.
In the minute 33, Robert Sibiga signals a throw-in for New York, close to Cincinnati's area.
Cincinnati are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
Robert Sibiga awards New York a goal kick.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Cincinnati.
In the minute 39, Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Daniel Royer of New York gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cincinnati goal kick.
In the minute 41, Cincinnati are pushing forward but Jurgen Locadia's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for New York at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Cincinnati is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Robert Sibiga has blown to start the second-half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Harrison to check on Nick Hagglund, who is grimacing with pain.
Nick Hagglund is back on the pitch.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Cincinnati in the half of New York.
In Harrison, Jurgen Locadia of Cincinnati is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Cincinnati in their own half.
New York's Cristian Casseres Jr has been booked in Harrison.
New York have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cincinnati in the half of New York.
In the minute 59, Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Can Cincinnati capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York's half?
Corner awarded to Cincinnati.
In the minute 60, Free kick for New York in their own half.
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Cincinnati in their own half.
In the minute 62, Yuya Kubo for Cincinnati gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
New York have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 64, Florian Valot is on a sub for Dru Yearwood for New York.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 66, New York have a dangerous throw-in.
Cincinnati needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
New York's Kyle Duncan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cincinnati defender.
In the minute 68, New York are coming forward and Brian White gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Cincinnati at Red Bull Arena.
Brandon Vazquez of Cincinnati smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 73, Robert Sibiga signals a Cincinnati throw-in in New York's half.
Robert Sibiga awards New York a goal kick.
Cincinnati awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, New York's Brian White has run offside.
At Red Bull Arena, Cincinnati are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, New York's Jason Pendant misses with an attempt on goal.
Cincinnati have a goal kick.
Jaap Stam (Cincinnati) is making a first substitution, with Allan Cruz replacing Yuya Kubo.
In the minute 79, Cincinnati are pushing forward but Brandon Vazquez's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
The home team have replaced Kaku with Omir Fernandez. This is the second substitution made today by Chris Armas.
In the minute 79, The home team replace Brian White with Samuel Tetteh.
Can New York capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cincinnati's half?
Cincinnati awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Can Cincinnati get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Cincinnati to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Cincinnati.
In the minute 81, Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cincinnati are coming forward and Haris Medunjanin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 85, Cincinnati have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Haris Medunjanin is on target to give Cincinnati a 0-1 advantage.
New York make their fourth substitution with Jared Stroud replacing Kyle Duncan.
In the minute 87, Tom Barlow is replacing Sean Nealis for New York at Red Bull Arena.
Nick Hagglund is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Corner awarded to New York.
Robert Sibiga will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Free kick for Cincinnati in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for New York in Harrison.
New York drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Jaap Stam is making the team's second substitution at Red Bull Arena with Caleb Stanko replacing Jurgen Locadia.
The away team has substituted Nick Hagglund with Maikel Van der Werff. Jaap Stam is thus making his third change.
Caleb Stanko for Cincinnati has been booked by Robert Sibiga and receives a first yellow card.
